full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THO YON BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,DPAL SNAR THANG PA DANG, ,DGE BSHES 'CHANG KHA BA GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS LAS GZHI BYAS TE LHA'I BTZUN PA SKU SKYES BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAM, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN,
